items.title: South African politician sacked over visit to fugitive pastor
items.description: South Africa is trying to extradite pastor Shepherd Bushiri from Malawi on fraud charges, which he denies.

items.title: Act now to save lives in Gaza, ICRC head urges world leaders
items.description: Mirjana Spoljaric has appealed to world leaders to intervene in the conflict in Gaza.

items.title: 'All Jewish Americans are questioning their security' after violent antisemitic attacks
items.description: Community leaders say people are anxious after recent attacks in Boulder and Washington DC showed that “anyone, anywhere” could be targeted.

items.title: Musk calls Trump's tax bill a 'disgusting abomination'
items.description: Billionaire says the bill, which faces a key test in the Senate, undercuts efforts to slash federal spending.

items.title: BBC rejects incorrect White House claims on Gaza coverage
items.description: The corporation says claims that a story was removed from its website are "completely wrong".
